name: CrowdHall
short_description:
CrowdHall allows users to host crowd-sourced town halls, empowering the crowd to
articulate its questions and voice its perspective.
long_description:
A CrowdHall is a crowd-sourced town hall built on the idea that public discourse
with high-profile people & organizations doesn't have to be one-sided. It
empowers the crowd to organize its thoughts, articulate its questions, and voice
its perspective in a democratic way.
